title: Remade Promotional game listed as a loss
body: See the title. We went into a game, our morg afkd, we remade, and now it's listed as a loss on my promotional series. I would think remade games simply wouldn't count towards wins/losses for a series. Also, I would note that I went to lane and all that, didn't just stand around, and was not queued with morg.

replies.body: This sounds like a strange situation, so I took a look for you to find out what's really happening.  After digging into this a bit, it looks like this is simply a visual issue.  I'm relieved to say that even though your match might show as a loss, no actual LP was lost.  You should still be able to continue playing through your series as normal!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=p0Bzl8iE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-07-22T18:38:20.085+0000)
>
> This sounds like a strange situation, so I took a look for you to find out what's really happening.  After digging into this a bit, it looks like this is simply a visual issue.  I'm relieved to say that even though your match might show as a loss, no actual LP was lost.  You should still be able to continue playing through your series as normal!

I will see if it updates later after my next game, and then check back after.

> [{quoted}](name=NetkingZetto,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=p0Bzl8iE,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-07-22T18:42:26.877+0000)
>
> I will see if it updates later after my next game, and then check back after.

HI so I just went through another game, and now it still shows as being a loss. Im not really sure if this is just a visual error.
